ygData.subject: Re: Question /new to the list
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, since the price of derv rings has bottomed out... Over in South Ro, to the right after you enter from Oasis, there is an Erudite merchant, who has a
ygData.messageBody:
Well,

since the price of derv rings has bottomed out...

Over in South Ro, to the right after you enter from Oasis, there is an
Erudite merchant, who has a named orc, Ortalius (?).
For every three derv rings you give him, he gives you xp, some cash
(silver/copper) and sometimes a random item (usually a rusty weapon, but
i've gotten bronze weapons, cloth and leather armour, also.
Use your charismatic carrilion on him, to get better stuff/more money.
Also, it doesn't seem to matter how many rings, up to three you give him,
when you give him a total of 3, he will reward you. As long as you don't
log, he seems to keep a running total for you. I gave him 5 the other day,
got one reward. A few hours later, i dropped back by, with a single, just
to see what would happen. He gave me the reward upon receipt of the ring.

Your mileage may vary.

MacGrough
16th Song Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers

-----Original Message-----
From: Woland Vildhufvud <wolandv@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question /new to the list


>From: "Woland Vildhufvud" <wolandv@...>
>
>At lvl 15 I looked up a group in the Derv Camp in West Commons. The spawn
>rate is very fast in this camp (same in all derv camps?) that the heal song
>will make them love you. Groups used to fight over me when I got there and
>they wept when I left lol. You may need an almost full group to hold the
>camp safely. The only problem is what do do with all the Derv Rings you
get,
>had 32 rings at one point so I started to give them away to newbies hehe.
>Also lots of Wisps around for that extra cash :) To me this camp was both
>good exp and loot.
>
>/Woland Vildhufvud - lvl 21 jester of E'ci
>
>
